co.paralleluniverse.strands.channels

Interface SendPort<Message>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Port<Message>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Channel<Message>, DoubleChannel, DoubleSendPort, FloatChannel, FloatSendPort, IntChannel, IntSendPort, LongChannel, LongSendPort
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActorRef, ActorRefDelegate, Behavior, EventSource, FakeActor, FilteringSendPort, Mailbox, MappingSendPort, QueueChannel, QueueDoubleChannel, QueueFloatChannel, QueueIntChannel, QueueLongChannel, QueueObjectChannel, QueuePrimitiveChannel, Server, SingleConsumerQueueChannel, Supervisor, TimeoutChannel, Topic, TransferChannel, TransformingSendPort

    public interface SendPort<Message>
extends Port<Message>, AutoCloseable

    A channel’s producer-side interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the channel so that no more messages could be sent to it.
      void send(Message message)
      Sends a message to the channel, possibly blocking until there’s room available in the channel.
      boolean send(Message message, long timeout, TimeUnit unit)
      Sends a message to the channel, possibly blocking until there’s room available in the channel, but never longer than the specified timeout.
      boolean send(Message message, Timeout timeout)
      Sends a message to the channel, possibly blocking until there’s room available in the channel, but never longer than the specified timeout.
      boolean trySend(Message message)
      Sends a message to the channel if the channel has room available.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        void send(Message message)
          throws SuspendExecution,
                 InterruptedException

        Sends a message to the channel, possibly blocking until there’s room available in the channel.

        If the channel is full, this method may block, throw an exception, silently drop the message, or displace an old message from the channel. The behavior is determined by the channel’s OverflowPolicy, set at construction time.

        Parameters:
        message -
        Throws:
        SuspendExecution
        InterruptedException

      • send

        boolean send(Message message,
           long timeout,
           TimeUnit unit)
             throws SuspendExecution,
                    InterruptedException

        Sends a message to the channel, possibly blocking until there’s room available in the channel, but never longer than the specified timeout.

        If the channel is full, this method may block, throw an exception, silently drop the message, or displace an old message from the channel. The behavior is determined by the channel’s OverflowPolicy, set at construction time.

        Parameters:
        message -
        timeout - the maximum duration this method is allowed to wait.
        unit - the timeout’s time unit
        Returns:
        true if the message has been sent successfully; false if the timeout has expired.
        Throws:
        SuspendExecution
        InterruptedException

      • send

        boolean send(Message message,
           Timeout timeout)
             throws SuspendExecution,
                    InterruptedException

        Sends a message to the channel, possibly blocking until there’s room available in the channel, but never longer than the specified timeout.

        If the channel is full, this method may block, throw an exception, silently drop the message, or displace an old message from the channel. The behavior is determined by the channel’s OverflowPolicy, set at construction time.

        Parameters:
        message -
        timeout - the method will not block for longer than the amount remaining in the Timeout
        Returns:
        true if the message has been sent successfully; false if the timeout has expired.
        Throws:
        SuspendExecution
        InterruptedException

      • trySend

        boolean trySend(Message message)

        Sends a message to the channel if the channel has room available. This method never blocks.

        Parameters:
        message -
        Returns:
        true if the message has been sent; false otherwise.

      • close

        void close()

        Closes the channel so that no more messages could be sent to it. Messages already sent to the channel will still be received.

        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
